description:
An established actress of great talent and self-professed star of the Hanagumi, Sumire is arrogant and conceited, yet shows a more gentler side of her at times.
Despite her attitude, she is a skilled Koubu pilot and highly capable of wielding the naginata.
Sumire is a daughter born into the elite Kanzaki industrial clan, whose factory produced the Koubu.
name: Kanzaki Sumire
